items.title: PW’s Best Books of the Year
items.description: Publishers Weekly's Best Books of 2025 lists have arrived, something for the Zadie Smith curious, bookish Halloween fun, and more.

items.title: Publishers Weekly has Announced its Picks for the Best Books of 2025
items.description: Ready or not, it's best books of the year season. Here are Publishers Weekly's picks for the ten best books of 2025.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for October 27, 2025
items.description: A haunting dystopia, thought-provoking short stories, a gothic horror-comedy, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: Romance Books for Dungeons & Dragons Fans
items.description: These six romance books capture the fun of a good D&D session, from cozy one-shots to high-stakes adventures.

items.title: Let’s Get Spooky: 5 Paranormal Mysteries for Halloween
items.description: What's more perfect that paranormal mysteries for Halloween? Here's five mysteries featuring ghosts and demons.
